sentences.en: 'John Silver,'he said,'you're a prodigious villain and impostor - a monstrous impostor, sir.
sentences.cn: “ 约翰-希尔弗, ” 他说, “ 你是个大坏蛋、大骗子 —— 是个十恶不赦的骗子, 先生.

sentences.en: An impostor could not pretend to have a good search engine.
sentences.cn: 这一点是说搜索引擎的排序策略不同.

sentences.en: Duke: Don't try to curry favor with me, impostor.
sentences.cn: 公爵: 不要试图甜言蜜语地哄骗我, 冒牌货.

sentences.en: First of all, you're probably wondering about the impostor s alpha channel.
sentences.cn: 首先, 你可能对视点替用特效的阿尔法通道感到疑惑.

sentences.en: He succeeded in his profession, but he always secretly considered himself an impostor.
sentences.cn: 他在专业方面很成功, 但他常暗自认为是个冒牌货.

sentences.en: I feel like a lousy impostor.
sentences.cn: 我感到自己象个不伦不类的冒名顶替犯.

sentences.en: It may be, you think me an impostor.
sentences.cn: 您也许以为我是冒名顶替的.

sentences.en: The impostor has been shown up.
sentences.cn: 那个骗子被揭露出来了.

sentences.en: The impostor traveled on a false passport.
sentences.cn: 那个伪装者用一本假护照旅行.

sentences.en: The nurse was soon discovered to be an impostor.
sentences.cn: 那个护士很快被发现是个冒牌货。

sentences.en: This is not Doctor Malcolm, he is an impostor.
sentences.cn: 这不是马尔科姆医生, 他是骗子.

sentences.en: This man is an impostor, who has stolen my throne.
sentences.cn: 这个人是个骗子, 他篡夺了我的王位.

sentences.en: We knew he was an impostor because he spoke with a foreign accent.
sentences.cn: 我们知道他是个骗子因为他说话带外国口音.

sentences.en: We look on him as an impostor.
You're not my brother, you impostor!
sentences.cn: 你不是我的兄弟, 你是个骗子!

trans.tran_en: someone who pretends to be someone else in order to trick people
